title: GDP growth to AI - Top 5 factors to drive the Indian stock market in 2026
summary: Market experts believe that 2026 is likely to remain a selective market. Global conditions will continue to be shaped by interest rate expectations, trade developments, and geopolitical risks.

title: Indian stock market: Neither gold nor silver! Experts see this theme to give a whopping return in 2026
summary: The Indian stock market has been in a base-building mode for the last one and a half years, according to market experts. Market indices Nifty 50 has delivered a return of 10% in 2025, meanwhile, Sensex surged up to 8%.

title: Venezuela, Iran could further pressure oil prices in 2026
summary: Even before the latest developments in Caracas and Tehran, forecasts pointed to an oversupply of crude this year.

summary: Since both equity and commodity markets undergo cycles, analysts are now of the view that equities will make a comeback in 2026.

title: This Tata group stock's 40% fall makes it the worst Nifty 50 performer of 2025: Is a turnaround likely this year?
summary: Shedding 40% in the last one year, Trent — the company behind fashion retail outlets like Westside and Zudio — has sharply underperformed the Nifty 50 index, which rose 10.5% in 2025. This is the first annual fall recorded by the company after a gap of 11 years.

title: US-Venezuela conflict, FII flows and Bharat Coking Coal IPO among 10 factors that’ll steer D-Street this week
summary: Nifty closed the week over 1% higher after hitting a fresh lifetime high, supported by buying in metal and PSU bank stocks. Technical indicators signal continued momentum, with a buy-on-dips strategy advised above 26,000. This week, markets will track geopolitical developments, crude oil trends, Wall Street cues and FII flows for direction.

title: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 5 January 2026
summary: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - Steel Authority of India, Indian Energy Exchange, and HCL Technologies.

title: Growth data to gold, silver prices: Top five triggers for Indian stock market this week
summary: On the market outlook in the coming week, Ponmudi R, CEO - Enrich Money, said that the Indian equities are expected to retain an upward bias, underpinned by strong domestic fundamentals, steady domestic institutional inflows, and expectations of healthy corporate earnings growth.

title: Trump says US will control Venezuelan oil; but is it really going to increase production? What experts say
summary: Just an investment, like Donald Trump touted, will not be enough. Any company that wants to operate with Venezuelan oil will need to deal with several issues, including security concerns.

title: FPIs pull out Rs 7,608 cr from equities in just 2 days of Jan
summary: Foreign portfolio investors have started 2026 on a cautious note, extending their selling streak from last year by withdrawing Rs 7,608 crore (USD 846 million) from Indian equities in the first two trading sessions of January.

title: Mcap of 7 of top-10 most valued firms surges Rs 1.23 lakh cr; Reliance biggest winner
summary: The combined market capitalisation of seven of the top-10 most-valued firms surged Rs 1,23,724.19 crore last week, in line with an optimistic trend in equities, with Reliance Industries stealing the limelight with the biggest jump in its valuation.

title: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 5 January 2025
summary: Sumeet Bagadia has recommended three stocks to buy on Monday, January 5. The three stock picks by Bagadia are - Yes Bank, Motherson Sumi Wiring India, and Dolat Algotech.

title: Over 15 Nifty 500 stocks gain 10–16% last week; Transformers & Rectifiers tops the list
summary: Ola Electric, Force Motors, and Hindustan Copper were among 16 Nifty 500 constituents gaining double digits last week as the Indian stock market continued its winning streak. The Nifty 50 surged 1.10%, its largest gain since November, with significant contributions from banking and metal stocks.

title: Elon Musk announces free Starlink services ‘in support of the people of Venezuela’ after Maduro's capture
summary: Elon Musk had earlier celebrated the capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro in a US military operation sanctioned by Trump, saying that Venezuela would finally prosper with Maduro gone.

title: Indian equity markets poised for corporate earnings-led revival in 2026: Report
summary: Indian equity markets are set for a stronger performance in 2026, backed by a possible recovery in corporate earnings, improving macroeconomic conditions and a potential revival in foreign investor flows, according to India Equity Strategy 2026: Earnings redux report by Antique Stock Broking Limited.

title: Less debt, no FOMO and structured investing: your 2026 money goals
